We will need to add a new action to Normandy for enrolling users in an individual Pioneer study. It should be similar to the opt-out-study action, with the following changes:

It should abort if the user does not have the Pioneer opt-in preference set.
It should mark the installed study as a Pioneer study using the new API from #1026.
The pre- and post- handlers should only operate on Pioneer studies, not normal ones.

We'll also need to update the opt-out action to ignore Pioneer studies.

title: Pioneer-specific study action
body:
We will need to add a new action to Normandy for enrolling users in an individual Pioneer study. It should be similar to the opt-out-study action, with the following changes:

- It should abort if the user does not have the Pioneer opt-in preference set.
- It should mark the installed study as a Pioneer study using the new API from #1026.
- The pre- and post- handlers should only operate on Pioneer studies, not normal ones.
  - We'll also need to update the opt-out action to ignore Pioneer studies.
